A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a Star Wars fan\, this has destroyed everything every previous film has created; even for the new trilogy of 7\,8 and 9 - this has undone almost all of Force Awakens. \nAs a film in general\, ignoring the fact that it exists in a pre-established universe (which you can't)\, the story is terrible. No character development\, and there are NO stakes. You do not fear for a character's safety after the impossible feats seen in the first act.
